Well lads and gents, a "cuntboy" is the polar opposite of a "futanari" or "dickgirl": it is a human being with masculin body characteristics that has a female sex organ instead of a male sex organ to go with his body characteristics.

In the hentai community, "cuntboys" are sometimes confused with "loli's" - due to both (most of the time) having no full breasts and being drawn very young.
